front.note:
Joint Collaborative Team on Video Coding (JCT-VC)
of ITU-T SG16 WP3 and ISO/IEC JTC1/SC29/WG11
front.div:
Abstract
This document provides the description for a Test Model under Consideration (TMuC). This suggested
Test Model is intended to provide a coding efficiency close to the best performing proposals in the
subjective test of the CfP submissions and also to provide a complexity point that is close to that of the
lowest complexity submissions shown to provide substantial improvement of coding efficiency. The
inclusion of a technology in this document does not indicate a final adoption of the technology as an
element of an approved test model of the committee. Rather, it indicates a preliminary selection which
may require further evaluation and justification to achieve that status.
This TMuC is based on the decisions taken at the 1
st meeting of JCT-VC in Dresden from 15-23 April
2010 and the further refinements agreed at the 2
nd meeting of JCT-VC in Geneva from 21-28 July 2010.
The principal documents agreed at the 2
nd meeting of JCT-VC which affect this TMuC are:
 Unified intra prediction (JCTVC-B100)
 Rounding control and transform precision expansion (JCTVC-B074)
